bench.description: Our new yard's been used for painting, eating, reading, and running.

friends.description: Felix found some new friends at a playground.
friends.title: Friends

max.description:
Playdate with Max. They BOTH wanted to be the princess.
<div style="margin-top:3;padding-top:3;spacing-top:3" />
Max loves trucks, which made us realize that Felix has almost completely stopped playing with cars and trains.  Now it's all about Legos.
max.title: Max

<u>Kids left to right</u>: Half of Caton, Torin, Albert, Max and Felix.
mayday.title: Mayday

playhouse4.description: Felix has been good at understanding the length of the project.  He's looking forward to the finished thing, but also taking pleasure in the process.

zilly1.description:
There's a new item in the costume box. 
<div style="margin-top:3;padding-top:3;spacing-top:3" />
Also:  see the boo-boo on his chin?  He's been amazingly clumsy this week, falling down constantly.   Growth spurt?  Inner ear problem?  Head in the clouds?  We don't know.
zilly1.title: Zilly 1

description:
We spent the weekend around the house. We're getting a lot of mileage out of our new yard. Dean likes how the landscapers got geeky with the irrigation: there's five seprate computer-controlled water zones!

Felix used to get scared at the littlest things in a movie, but all of a sudden he's able to watch scary stuff like dinosaurs fighting. He's even okay when one dies. His play now includes characters dying. He's thinking about why people die: he's got the old age thing, and now he's trying to understand what else can be a cause of death. When we tell him to be careful when climbing, he'll ask whether he could die. We're straight with him: we tell him it's possible he could die, but very unlikely.

Milo turned 9 months old. Height: 29 inches (73 cm). Weight: 18 lbs 8 oz (8.4 kg). Felix was heavier by over 5 pounds, at that age!

Milo's clapping a lot. Sometimes it's when he enjoys something, like when Felix does something funny, or when he eats something he really likes. We like the idea of our little gourmand applauding his mushed banana. Also, we think he said bye bye to someone, but he might have just been repeating Lucie.
title: May 1
